channel.title: PMI on James Hughes
channel.description: Recent content in PMI on James Hughes

item.title: My Dive into Neo4j - and my PMP
item.description: Man, I need to get my life figured out! I spend so much of my free time diving into new technology that I’m just waiting for my wife to pull the pin. Sorry dearest! The nerdom never dies! I just finished my application for my PMP exam (Project Management Professional - shameless self plug) and it was accepted. So once I scrounge up some dough I’ll be paying to take the test and then we are off to the races!
